<!-- TastyShare Recipe Sharing Platform Project Instructions -->

# TastyShare Recipe Sharing Platform

This is a Flask-based web application for recipe sharing with the following features:
- User registration and authentication (JWT-based)
- Recipe management (CRUD operations)
- Search and filtering capabilities
- Rating and review system
- Admin panel for content moderation
- Responsive design

## Technology Stack
- Backend: Python Flask
- Database: SQLite
- Frontend: HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- Authentication: JWT
- File Upload: For recipe images

## Project Structure
- `app.py` - Main Flask application
- `models/` - Database models
- `routes/` - API endpoints
- `templates/` - HTML templates
- `static/` - CSS, JS, and images
- `requirements.txt` - Python dependencies

## Development Guidelines
- Follow MVC architecture
- Implement proper error handling
- Use responsive design principles
- Ensure input validation and security
- Maintain clean, modular code
